content.text: Match ends, Sabadell 1, Mallorca 1.
Second Half ends, Sabadell 1, Mallorca 1.
Goal!  Sabadell 1, Mallorca 1. Pau Cendrós (Mallorca) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Xisco following a set piece situation.
